DataSource.AseeAPI.description: Asee API DataSource is data source for Asse REST APIs

serviceName.description: Specifies the name of service. For example `"party"`

serviceVersion.description: Specifies the service version. For example `"v1"`

serviceEndpoint.description: Specifies the endpoint for service. For example `"parties/search?q="`

responseArrayPath.description: Specifies the root path for response array. For example '"parties"'
